game.name: DCS: F-15C Flaming Cliffs
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Note: This is the exact same simulation of the F-15C as featured in DCS: Flaming Cliffs 3.The F-15 has often been labeled as the greatest fighter aircraft in the world from the 1970s until the early 21st century. Designed to counter the exaggerated capabilities of the Soviet MiG-25 "Foxbat", the F-1
